description: This Dashboard provides more visibility into the logs generated by NGINX App Protect. This is part of a series of NGINX App Protect Dashboards

targets.query: violations.context.keyword:$context && virtualServerName.keyword:$vsname && requestPolicy.fullPath.keyword:$policy && host.keyword:$device && violations.signature.risk.keyword:$risk && violations.signature.accuracy.keyword:$accuracy && (violations.context.keyword:parameters || violations.context.keyword:headers || violations.context.keyword:cookies) && violations.violation.name.keyword:VIOL_ATTACK_SIGNATURE
